sys_script_include.name: FowardWebhook

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_rhtpp_eda.FowardWebhook</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>FowardWebhook</name><script><![CDATA[var FowardWebhook = Class.create();
FowardWebhook.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getWebhookUrl: function() {
        var req = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        req.setEndpoint(this.getParameter('url'));
        req.setHttpMethod("post");
        req.setRequestHeader("Authorization", "Bearer " + this.getParameter('token'));
        req.setRequestBody(this.getParameter('body'));
        var response = req.execute();
        status = response.getStatusCode();
        gs.info("Webhook HTTP status response: " + status);
        return status;
    },
    type: 'FowardWebhook'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>hui_song</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-11 21:42:54</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>764fbfd01b0cf190b76a0d0fdc4bcb96</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FowardWebhook</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Event-Driven Ansible Notification Service" source="x_rhtpp_eda">cb4182e69767611049b0b9dfe153af15</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Event-Driven Ansible Notification Service">cb4182e69767611049b0b9dfe153af15</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_764fbfd01b0cf190b76a0d0fdc4bcb96</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>hui_song</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-11 22:55:26</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
